de.esoco.lib.service

Class ModificationSyncEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.AbstractFunction<org.obrel.core.Relatable,Connection>
        • de.esoco.lib.comm.Endpoint
          • de.esoco.lib.comm.HttpEndpoint
            • de.esoco.lib.service.ModificationSyncEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<Endpoint>, java.util.function.Function<org.obrel.core.Relatable,Connection>, org.obrel.core.FluentRelatable<Endpoint>, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class ModificationSyncEndpoint
extends HttpEndpoint
    The HTTP endpoint for interaction with the ModificationSyncService REST service. The endpoint itself uses the standard HTTP endpoint implementation. An instance can be created by invoking the standard method Endpoint.at(String) with the sync service URL. This class only serves as a holder for the static REST method definitions that are specific for the sync service.

      static class  ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncData
      A simple data record that contains the data needed for a synchronization request and a method to convert it into JSON.

      The base class for request methods to the ModificationSyncEndpoint.

      • ModificationSyncEndpoint

        public ModificationSyncEndpoint()

    • Method Detail

      • forceSyncRequest

        public static ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncData forceSyncRequest(java.lang.String sClient,
                                                                 java.lang.String sContext,
                                                                 java.lang.String sTargetId)
        Static helper method that creates the data record for a forced synchronization request. This should only be used by management code for the handling of invalid locks.
        Parameters:
        sClient - A unique identifier of the client making the request
        sContext - The name of the synchronization context
        sTargetId - The unique ID of the target to synchronize
        Returns:
        The data record for use with ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncRequest

      • getCurrentLocks

        public static ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncRequest getCurrentLocks()
        Returns a request method that will query the current locks. The result is a map that contains entries for the lock contexts. Each context entry contains another mapping from target IDs to the addresses of the clients that hold the locks.
        Returns:
        The request method

      • releaseLock

        public static ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncRequest releaseLock()
        Returns a request method that will release a lock on an certain target.
        Returns:
        The request method

      • requestLock

        public static ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncRequest requestLock()
        Returns a request method that will lock a certain target.
        Returns:
        The request method

      • syncRequest

        public static ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncData syncRequest(java.lang.String sClient,
                                                            java.lang.String sContext,
                                                            java.lang.String sTargetId)
        Static helper method that creates the data record for a synchronization request.
        Parameters:
        sClient - A unique identifier of the client making the request
        sContext - The name of the synchronization context
        sTargetId - The unique ID of the target to synchronize
        Returns:
        The data record for use with ModificationSyncEndpoint.SyncRequest
